text: Odessa is a village in Schuyler County, New York, United States. As in the 2020 census, 517 people live there. The Village of Odessa is in the western side of the Town of Catharine near the town line. It is shared with the Town of Montour. Odessa is north of Elmira, New York. ==Demographics== ==References== ==Sources== * ==Other websites== * Local news for Odessa and region Category:Villages in New York (state) Category:Settlements in Schuyler County, New York
title: Odessa, New York
